body:
### Portfolio
Welcome to my GitHub Pages site. Explore my [Projects](./#projects), browse my [Links](./links.html), or download my [CV](./assets/Cosmas-Onyekwelu-CV.pdf).

I build clean, scalable web products — CRM systems, social platforms, and trading dashboards — using Node.js, React, and MongoDB.

### Tech
**MERN**, **Node.js**, **React**, **MongoDB**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind**.

### Contact
Email: dpositiveworld@gmail.com
